channel.title: TJ's Twilight Zone
channel.description:
Welcome to TJ's Twilight Zone. A haven for cratediggers. Here you'll find B sides, album tracks, remixes, cover versions and mashups aswell as some fantastic tunes you've not heard for ages!
Please enjoy TJ's Twilight Zone responsibly.
If you have any comments, requests or if you remix or you're in a band and you want me to play your stuff get intouch: tj@phoenixradio.co.uk
cheers
TJ
.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Give it a listen!
channel.itunes:author: TJ Nexus

item.title: TJ's Twilight Zone 25 July 2010
item.description: Can you believe we're at the end of July alrady? Here's the show from July 25 as if to prove it. tj@phoenixradio.co.uk
item.dc:creator: TJ Nexus
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: TJ's Twilight Zone 18 July 2010
item.description: Well here it is, the one after the Live Aid special and as promised there is an exclusive interview with Midge Ure in this weeks show..... Enjoy tj@phoenixradio.co.uk
item.dc:creator: TJ Nexus
item.itunes:summary:
Well here it is, the one after the Live Aid special and as promised there is an exclusive interview with Midge Ure in this weeks show.....
Enjoy
tj@phoenixradio.co.uk

item.title: TJ's Twilight Zone Live Aid Special 11 July 2010
item.description: July 13th 2010 will be the 25th anniversary of Live Aid. To mark that fact this show is made up of highlights from old VHS tapes of the original broadcast. Rockin All Over The World - Status Quo I Don't Like Mondays - The Boomtown Rats All You Need Is Love - Elvis Costello Bad - U2 We Will Rock You - Queen We Are The Champions - Queen Stairway To Heaven - Phil Collins, Robert Plant, Jimmy Paige and John Paul Jones Modern Love - David Bowie Appeal from Woody Allen My Generation - The Who Can I Get A Witness - Elton John Is This The World We Created - Freddie Mercury and Brian May Let It Be - Paul McCartney Do They Know It's Christmas - UK Finale The DVD of Live Aid is still available. Go and buy it. tj@phoenixradio.co.uk
item.dc:creator: TJ Nexus
item.itunes:summary:
July 13th 2010 will be the 25th anniversary of Live Aid. To mark that fact this show is made up of highlights from old VHS tapes of the original broadcast.
Rockin All Over The World - Status Quo I Don't Like Mondays - The Boomtown Rats All You Need Is Love - Elvis Costello Bad - U2 We Will Rock You - Queen We Are The Champions - Queen Stairway To Heaven - Phil Collins, Robert Plant, Jimmy Paige and John Paul Jones Modern Love - David Bowie Appeal from Woody Allen My Generation - The Who Can I Get A Witness - Elton John Is This The World We Created - Freddie Mercury and Brian May Let It Be - Paul McCartney Do They Know It's Christmas - UK Finale
The DVD of Live Aid is still available. Go and buy it.
tj@phoenixradio.co.uk
